name: IIINEVITABLE
description:
IIINEVITABLE is a 3 act retro meditation on free will, loss, and failure. Players can expect to laugh, cry, and everything in between-- all in the span of 30 minutes. Enjoy our entry to the 2020 GMTK jam: out of control!

BY TEAM TENACIOUS: DEFICIENCYPRODUCTIONZ & JOETHEBOX
